basics.name: Francisco Manuel Olmedo Cortés
basics.label: AI Solutions Architect & Physicist
basics.summary: AI Solutions Architect and Physicist with 2+ years of experience building automation infrastructures and intelligent systems that solve real business problems. Founder of BlakIA, where I design AI solutions that reduce costs, increase operational efficiency, and deliver measurable impact. Strong academic background in physics and optics research, with hands-on expertise in LLMs, Python, and cloud-based deployments.

work.name: BlakIA
highlights: Designed and deployed custom AI pipelines for SMEs, integrating LLMs, RAG systems, and automation tools like n8n and LangChain.
Developed infrastructure that handled +100K messages during city events, enabling real-time communication via WhatsApp and web bots.
Implemented scalable multi-tenant SaaS architecture with monitoring, metrics, and self-service dashboards for clients.
Built end-to-end automation systems that reduced manual workload by 60% for consulting and marketing clients.
Developed lead qualification bots and internal tools using OpenAI APIs, LLMOps strategies, and vector databases.

work.name: Universidad de Córdoba
highlights: Led the development of simulation software for disordered optical materials using ray tracing and genetic algorithms.

work.name: IDENER.AI
highlights: Applied neural network models for time series forecasting to improve energy production predictions.

work.name: Universidad de Córdoba
highlights: Taught introductory courses in Python and data science, focusing on applications in scientific research.

work.name: CIEMAT
highlights: Developed simulation models for thermoluminescent materials, enhancing performance prediction accuracy.

publications.name: Correlation between figure of merit function and deviation in the assessment of kinetic parameters in realistic TLD-100 behavior using fully-connected neural networks
